long_description: The PacSafe CitySafe 100 GII Handbag for women is packed with features that make it resistant to water, and to theft! Areas most commonly vulnerable to slash-and-run thefts have slashproof, high-tensile stainless-steel eXomesh(R) wire laminated between the nylon layers. Slashproof and snatchproof shoulder straps contain high-tensile stainless-steel wire to prevent slash-and-run thefts. Turn-and-lock security hook unfastens to attach your bag to a secure fixture, and has a turning mechanism that locks the hook in place. Zipper pulls can be attached to discreet security hooks or stay hidden by a hypalon tab to prevent pickpockets. RFID-blocking pocket protects passports and credit and debit cards from unauthorized scanning. The PacSafe CitySafe 100 GII Handbag for women has a zippered main compartment, internal electronics pocket, a padded tablet or 13" laptop sleeve and a zippered rear pocket.
short_description: The PacSafe CitySafe 100 GII Handbag for women is packed with features that make it resistant to water, and to theft!
